author: Aaron Johnson
comment: It's a good game but having an add after every puzzle is a bit much. Yake a bit too much time and easyy to lose interest. Maybe every 5 puzzles wo ups be better I know y'all gotta make your money but the constant ads make me want to uninstall.

author: Raship Shah
comment: SenseLess pictures to form words. Game is designed in a way that you not find words. So you spend on coins. And after revealing, there was no way such words can be formed. For example : Heir(picture of prince) + few buffaloes=? plain =AIRPLANE. what???

author: Katannia Plummer
comment: Loving the game. However, 1. The user interface looks a little bland. 2. most importantly, $2 for solving a word where clues range from  $10-$150 is kinda outrageous.  If we could get like $4 or even $5, that would make the game more appetizing.

author: Stephanie Davis
comment: It's ok, I wish the words were harder. The pop ups are far less than many other apps and I like games like this, even more so when they are challenging. I give it 3 stars.
It's fun to try and figure out the problem. You get coins easily too. The adds are a bit annoying, but they don't pop up much

author: Dee Doo
comment: Someone always tries to help me-- out loud. And an AD every game (but I chose this free version, and it only takes a second to X out), otherwise great game.

author: Jenny Tolios
comment: Really fun game! Just a couple of itsy bitsy things that get on my nerves. The coins you win are miniscule compared with how many you need when you use the Help function (even bumping it up to 5 coins for each correct answer would be better) & the other thing...I get that you need ads to keep these games free but does there need to be an ad after EVERY SINGLE PUZZLE??

This game is so amazing. First off you get to do things.!!!!! Wow. Second off you get to do stuff...!!!!!!!!!even more wow And third off you get to do other stuff man this game is just to bad.    I mean just way to not good I meant waaaaaaay to goooooooooooooood😉😎😀😃👌👍🖒terrific stuff and that resolution the things p I mean 1080 p

author: joanne weyman
comment: Good little brain teasers. You can't be too literal when deciphering  the clues. The picture can represent a colour, shape, object or feeling so it forces you to think laterally.  I really enjoy playing this game.

author: Graham Long
comment: Since no one reads 5 star reviews I figured I would rate as 1. Great time killer during those boring meetings or occasional bouts of constipation. Want to take a break from your mind numbing job? This is equally mind numbing....but hey, play on your bosses time. When you see a picture you can't figure out, lower your mental ability to where it makes an amoeba seem like Einstein......from there you will get every puzzle. Enjoy

author: millionsage 659
comment: Once I found out what some of the words were I felt like an idiot. So don't be like me the answers are obvious.

author: d th Harvey
comment: Great game.. Some of the phrases though are american which makes them a bit more tricky to figure out. The adds are not intrusive either. A great time waster

author: Mihi Sadler
comment: The game  is good but alot  of  adds keep poping up. but i know you guys got to make your money and that.  my kids like to play this game and they enjoy playing it but sometimes the photos don't really make sence and then they lose intrest in the game and even some times im teptered to uninstall this game sometimes when i get mad with this game.

author: Erik spangler
comment: Ads every time you answer a question. So annoying.  I can see after 3-5. However it is after each question

author: Alex Ross
comment: So... I love the idea for this game. The pictures do not represent the words in the slightest. AT ALL! When you look at a photo, it Should be one of the first words to come to mind, or at least the 5th, but some of these pictures are just so freaking terrible. Just play it. You'll hate this game because how the hell are shirt sleeves representative of clothes? You have to play to understand. This is the worst game that I cannot stop playing. I have to look up half the answers because the picture is a monopoly board and the word is "house"... like what the heck guys?!

author: Jessie Powell
comment: It's a decent game it's pretty addicting and fun but it had so many ads! I think it is ridiculous we are expected to pay for a ad free version

author: Robin KIGGINS
comment: Just when I started thinking this game was too simple & a distraction at best, the pictures became harder. Especially the 2 pics/one word challenges. Addicted for now :-)
This game is so bad.I hate it. You all persons are mad who give 5 and 4 stars to this game

author: Malinda Lavolpe
comment: I've had many problems when beginning a game!! That's a big turn off

author: Crazy AboutJCrew
comment: Gray brain-teaser for down times. I usually play with my daughter in the subway

author: Brenda Stevens
comment: It starts out easy then you have to really think . I really enjoy the challenge. And I like that you can watch a few videos  to get more coins if you get stumped.

author: Charlie Beans
comment: I liked it originally,  the problem comes on when you need to earn points. You do surveys etc then nothing. Such a waste so I'm unhappy and deleting.

author: Mikayla Keogh
comment: A great game for when your waiting around and bore. It's really fun when you get your friends involved and try to figure it out together. Plus it helps you to learn new objects you didn't even know. Therefore, great for kids!
Was going to give top review until I discovered app is yet another so called free app that costs me money by stealing my data.

author: Jean Speckin
comment: I am revising my review from 2015. I enjoy this game, come puzzles can be challenging and others I'll figure out immediately. Keeps the mind sharp and help pass time when needed.

author: Judith Moore
comment: Enjoy having to use my brain to find answers.  Some clues a little off the mark but that is not uncommon in these type of games.

author: Phindile Khoza
comment: This game keeps me on my toes all the time, i get frustrated when i cant out the word and picture, cause i dont like going for clues.
Is fun. Some levels are more difficult but still like the challenge. The ads are very short & you can click out of them.

author: Londiwe Xaba
comment: Kills time but the adverts are boring for taking full screen but anyway since it's free I don't mind them.

author: Joe Rodriguez
comment: This game handles ads very well. Has the option to turn them off so I left them on to support the devs. Fun game also

author: Donnie Cox
comment: It's a fun game but when it got down to buying coins, I was stymied. I just can't buy any so my chances of progress are limited

author: Jeanne Francis Rivas
comment: Its fun its a classic but make it harder its so easy im not saying its bad it is just so easy but i like the game keep it up Kooapps

author: Kailey Stanislav
comment: Sometimes the hard ones are so simple you can only laugh at yourself and with friends when ya finally get the answer when ya got stuck for a minute. It's a  time passing game and you can definitely pick your brain with friends or just my yourself. I like to play at night befor bed,  takes my mind off everything else and let's me focus my thoughts on getting the answer.

author: Cedric Rome
comment: Some of the answers aren't real even words ex: "Webmail" "Layoff". Good thing the pictures are so painfully obvious that the puzzles are still way too easy.

author: Barry Downings
comment: Good game to play with friends. Bad that the words are sometimes spelt wrong as it could confuse younger players.

author: Carol Milburn
comment: There were too many ads.  Really! After every game? This made me really dislike this game!

author: Pamela Hayden
comment: Some pictures need more details. The more I play, the more I like. Sometimes screens freeze. Hope that gets taken care of.

author: Andhara Sugandi
comment: The game's quite fun. I used hints for the most part, but I did quite well. But I don't know if I were to play this game another time but, I can play it for some time.
I love this brain challenging games it keeps me motivated Sharp and number one I am telling you I am really enjoying this time it is truly awesome yay

author: Kristen Fairman
comment: This game is awesome the only thing I'd change is the ability to drag the letters so I can try diff combinations. Thankyou for an awesome game.
